subject: Girls like that
body:
Girls lie when they say "size doesn't matter" 
that's just to make us feel better, The truth is they want their partner to 
have a huge one, and they will keep searching until they find it!Now you can 
be that big man with the new improved and doctor recommended enlargement pills, 

click here to get your 
supply before they sell out! http://tidkar.com/

and made assumptions as if perfect competition and perfect knowledge
